events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund. The product is not what I purchased.
The customer's report mentions receiving the wrong item and requesting a refund, categorizing this case under Refund.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Linda Thompson for further handling of the refund request.
Hello, this is Linda from customer support. I understand you received an incorrect item and would like to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received, along with your order number, so we can verify your claim and process the refund?
I have attached photos of the incorrect item, along with a screenshot of my original order confirmation for your reference.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method immediately. You should see the amount returned within 5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and refund confirmation. Thank you for resolving this matter promptly.
The refund process has been completed successfully. Please contact us if you have any further questions or issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if we can assist you with anything else.
As there have been no further replies, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on your recent support experience. Your input is greatly appreciated.
